scripts.build: pnpm --filter @quicke/db build && pnpm --filter quicke build && pnpm --filter "@quicke/api-worker" build
scripts.sync:schema: cp packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma apps/api-worker/prisma/schema.prisma && cp packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma apps/web/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:generate: pnpm sync:schema && pnpm --filter @quicke/db exec prisma generate && pnpm --filter "@quicke/api-worker" exec prisma generate && pnpm --filter quicke exec prisma generate
